description.value:
Note: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.Z68Q5K5fejrVQZAy]{Clerics} and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.Zg89AoSarbFbVnPY]{Paladins} can already use a weapon with a holy symbol as a focus, and some other characters gain a feature equivalent to this one: Warlocks with a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.QfgyRthZkHYTXO0I]{Pact of the Warrior}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-subclass.Item.TKxwHbfDmSdPTkee]{Mystic Trickster} Rogues, and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-subclass.Item.yHHwqD7r32bVXSUQ]{Spellsword} Fighters.

  • You can use any weapon you are proficient with as a spellcasting focus.

  • You can perform the somatic components of spells even if you are holding weapons and/or a shield in both your hands.
